item.title: „Those who don’t learn from history are doomed to repeat it.“ 💔 My page is not political, I’m not a political expert but I care about the future of our society and our planet and seeing the current political developments really scares me… I can’t do much

item.title: Sick soup 🍜 You’re sick, you’re feeling under the weather or you just want a warming meal… this soup is there for you! 🫶 RECIPE (2 servings, 15min prep time): -2 cloves garlic -2 spronions -a thumbsize piece of ginger Chop and sauté in some oil. -veggie

item.title: Antwort auf @Nana_Banana4212 🍊🤡🆘🇺🇸🏴 After following these tips I went from hating matcha to loving it! 🥹 1️⃣ Bloom your chase (if using one) 2️⃣ Use high quality, ceremonial matcha 3️⃣ Use warm NOT boiling water (it’d make it bitter) 4️⃣ Mix Sweet and sal
